unnormalised: Arre, Ms. Sharma itlyo begin Mrs. Verma zali! Atam tika Smt. Verma mhuntat, dishta konnek tori tancho 'Mr. Right' mell'llo ;)
normalised: Arre, Missus Sharma kitlii vegim Missus Verma zali! Aata tica Shrimati Verma mhuntat, dishtaa konnak tori aplem 'Mister Right' mell'llelem dista ;)
